values:
hey.
my boyfriend told me he loves me =]
so ive been in the best mood for the past month-ish.
and almost nothing could make me mad.
and even if something did, id get over it faster than someone walking on fire =]

so anyone who wants to make me mad, fuck you!

so its been a while. a couple entries ago i wrote about how dave aaron and rob were the greatest people ever... well i lied. ever since olta left they havent talked to me one time. oh yeah i do talk to olta all the time. why wouldnt i? shes my best friend.

i have my 6th hour. my least favorite thing about school for shure is that class now. i kinda dont like school that much in general.

i started drivers training and my last day is tomorrow. my last driving lesson is today in about an hour. i have a soccer game tomorrow too, its at 11.00pm. kinda pissed about that.

i have a bowling tournment this weekend and im gonna be in the newspaper for it. no joke so look for me. my brother was in it yesterday so look at that too. 

payyyyyce.

so yesterday was fun.
comments are accepted.

well my life is about to flip.
and i dont think i will be able to handle it.
if you dont know whats up then dont ask.
just needed to let everyone know
i wont be the same after november.

So I went to the green day concert last sunday.
it was awesome.
and i love Billie Joe. More than anyone.

Almost got kicked off the basketball team today also.
basketball's not my favorite thing.
speciall with a coach like Dawson.

Homecoming is in a day. Kinda fricken excited.
Pep rally tomorrow and football game.
Better see everyone at that game.
Peace Out.
comment to be added mother fuckers.

friends cut.
comment to be kept.
7 days.[till your cut]

lang hnrs II- sailer
inrto bus- rose
math II GSP- ennis
US History-10- vanhull
computer appl- mcarthur
science II- klopman

locker #265

leave me comments.

summers almost over. damn. 
im gonna miss it a lot. 
and im really upset that i didnt get to see some people.
but ive come to a conclusion...
im not that good of a friend. and some people are probably reading this like
"wtf i knew that a long ass time ago".
but the truth is.. no matter how much i dont show it.
i do care. and i do like talking to you. 
and im sorry.

this entry blows.

so the past couple of weeks have been weird... 
i guess me and ryan trevino arent friends?
i dont know. school blows.. and now we jut have to go back. 
i wish summer would never end.
and i wish people would fuckin call me sometime. 
4623299 <3 i miss everyone.

woohoo im leaving watertucky.
amanda and me are going to traverse city! im coming home on friday. so call me. 
god this place is boring!
<3 4623299

FUCK MY ASS!!

okay so tonight was the most exciting night of my whole life. I love Olta and Cory and Megan and Jordan and Kelsie to death. 

tonight we all went to the lake by kelsies house and argued for about 10 minutes about going skinny dipping. then we all went in and were like oh well lets go to the water trampoline. good idea ;) 

so cory jordan and kelsie went out there while me olta and megan stayed by the slide. then here come someone down the hill.... getting closer... into the light... KELSIES MOM! holy shit. 

me megan and olta hid behind the slide. cory kelsie and jordan jumped in the water. we got dressed, jordan left, cory went to jordans and me and olta are at oltas house. kelsie's grounded for like 3 months and megan has to stay there the rest of the week :/

im soo sorry kelsie. we didnt mean for you to get in trouble. im sorry also cuz that was the most fun ive had in a long ass time. 

4623299 <------- hit that shit bitch.

does anyone wanna hang out?
leave me a fucking comment with you fone number,
we'll chill like were in fuckin Alaska.
<3

i know i said i wasnt gonna update but i think this is worth it.
i sliced my hand open today and got 4 stitches.
im an idiot!
<3 leave me comments

so im on the mutha fuckin request line to update? well if people dont start commenting on this piece of horse shit then i might not do that no mo. ima fuckin gangsta and i aint play doe. ima fuckin update when 34 people le dem comments, good luck mutha fucka's

peace out

Post anonymously.
Speak honestly. Post as many times as you like. One faceless wonder to another.



But if you have something to say, just say it.
Whoever you are.

Hey!!

Well I am a little ticked off. Monday is my birthday and of course my brothers have a baseball game... again. I dont think ive had a birthday when they havent had to do something. So I get to stay home by myself on my birthday... since my dad is in Cleveland. Cant wait for that.

I havent seen Ryan in a long ass time and its makin me a little upset. He got 14 stitches in his foot so he cant do much of anything. So he probably forgot about my birthday too. Just like my family...

Hey!!

I just got back from my cousins house. I was there for 3 days. It was pretty cool, we hung out with some of her friends and we went shopping and we went to the drive in. I saw Mr. and Mrs. Smith and The Pacifier (sp?). Yeah so it was pretty sweet.

When Ed gets out of the shower we are going golfing! Im kinda excited lol. Im glad im home now though. I missed it here. In good ol' Watertucky! 

TaLk To YoU lAtEr KiDs...
<3KaErBeAr~

ps my birthday is in 4 days...

You Belong in 1969
1969
If you scored... 1950 - 1959: You're fun loving, romantic, and more than a little innocent. See you at the drive in! 1960 - 1969: You are a free spirit with a huge heart. Love, peace, and happiness rule - oh, and drugs too. 1970 - 1979: Bold and brash, you take life by the horns. Whether you're partying or protesting, you give it your all! 1980 - 1989: Wild, over the top, and just a little bit cheesy. You're colorful at night - and successful during the day. 1990 - 1999: With you anything goes! You're grunge one day, ghetto fabulous the next. It's all good!
What Year Do You Belong In?
ps... my birthday is in 6 days

Hey
Im kinda in a teriible mood lately. People not answering when I call and people pissin me the fuck off at school. My grade goin down the shit hole...

Im glad schools about to get out. A lot of people are sad or upset or w.e but damn I cant fuckin wait to get out. I can't wait till seniors commencments (sp?) I cant wait till I go up north for a long ass time. I hate school all of a sudden. I was doing good then I just gave up.

Our last soccer game is tomorrow :/ I am kinda excited but kinda upset. Ill never see some of those people again. It's gonna be a fun game. Today was our last practice! It was a lot of fun. Im glad I never quit or got kicked off the team earlier in the season.

TaLk To YoU lAtEr KiDs...
<3 KaErBeAr~

Hey!!

Yesterday we had a game against Harrison, we lost 4-0 that was probly my least favorite game of my whole life. The game wasnt worth anything though so Im over it lol. We dont have soccer again until Monday which is a HUGE relief! 

I dont like school very much. I hate my 6th hour and my 2nd hour. My 3rd hour is my least favorite subject and 4th hour stresses me out. Our preject in science(4th hour) is due next week and we are presenting. I just dont like school very much. Tomorrow is senior skip day. I asked my mom if I could skip lol she said "your not a senior only Peter is staying home" 

So I have nothing else to talk about really. I get to be the photographer for my brother and Megan before Prom tomorrow and I have bowling too so it should be a good day. 

TaLk To YoU lAtEr KiDs...
<3 KaErBeAr~

League Champs Baby!!!!!!!!

We won 5-0 against southfield and are now the league champs. Hell yeah!!

Hey!!

So I havent updated in a while...sorry. My computer is broke like no other so we have to order parts for it. I am on my dad;s now though. I had to break into my own house today cuz someone stole our spare key, and no one is home. Work was crazy today there was like 15 people in line omg. 

We had a soccer game on thursday and we won 7-0. I saved a PK! It was pretty sweet lol it hit the cross bar and then I jumped and got it haha. I miss hanging out with everyone :/ 

I dont have much to say other than everyone better be at the game on Monday we play Kettering! I love soccer, with a passion.

TaLk To YoU lAtEr KiDs...
<3 KaErBeAr~

So I was in the newspaper for the first time! They spelled my name wrong though :/ ::kaes:: lol damn sloppy typers :) Im very happy that I played... and thank you everyone who was yelling for me! We have a game tomorrow against Clarkston at Pierce so you guys should all come see that game too. 

I went to work this morning until 12 and then I hung out with Ryan for a while :) and then I came home and went out to wat with my daddy to Village Place. Anthony Zamora was our server! well seater lol. Then I called Amanda when I got home and went up to Burt for like 30 seconds lol cuz she was riding her mo-ped.so I just got done riding my bike now I am gonna go take a shower before I have to go bowling tonight! 

TaLk To YoU lAtEr KiDs...
<3 KaErBeAr

I played tonight! The whole fuckin game! I had a shut out and everyone was there. People I dont even noe were telling me "great job keeper". Man I love this game.

Tonight was probably one of the best nights ever. I have never been hurt so bad, and felt so good at the same time in my whole life. I am soo glad that I got to play this game! Im going to bed now though. Good Night everyone!

Kristy Kaer

well this should be interesting.... if i do say so myself.

Come watch the game tonight at 7. Its at pierce against Kettering.
If you woke up and I was in bed with you, what would be your first thought? post this in your journal and see the responses you get.
MICHIGAN STATE RULES!! FINAL FOUR BITCHES!!

These are the nights that make me wanna stay in band. 

Vincentte, Frank, Amanda, Kali, Tom, man tonight was fun.

So my mom hates me. And its all my fault, 

"you know everything, just remember that" her last words spoken to me ... probly for a while.

Hi my name's Kristy Kaer and I do not smoke.

<.>EDIT<.>
Sorry... I guess it was another one of my best friends as well. Who told Justin.I wish I picked a few better people to hang with. (no offence unless further spoken to) Im sorry Justin.

HAPPY BIRTHDAY GEORGUS! (sp??)


I hope you had a good birthday Olta... oh geez I was there so it had to be lol. I love you!

Hey

Today is a snowday... and I did not get more than 3 hours of sleep all together last night. My mom is mad because I was up till 10*30 talking to my dad about my 4 year plan. He is in fucking Virginia and is the only person who can help me. I mean I know my mom wants to help, well actually maybe not, but she knows nothing NOTHING about the courses that I was to study in. All she would say to me is "take spanish or gym" cuz thats all she knows. So I told her that I was going to Ryan's so that his mom could help me out and she was like "w.e i can help you why dont you ask his mom doesnt even know you" blah blah freaking blah. I swear I was so fucking temped to say, "well neither do you so whats the difference" So I told my dad about going to Ryan's and he said that it was probably a good idea since my mom is uncapable of helping me make decisions of any kind.

I honestly wish that my mom could accept the fact that I will not get into a university and I will never be as smart as Peter or Eddie and that I will not ever make her proud of me. No matter what I do there is always something wrong with it. My dad can accept the fact that im not the smartest person around, all my friends accept it and my brothers accept it so why cant she!? Ahh I am so aggravated. Im gonna try and sleep. Have a nice snow day.

Sorry about all this loser complaining again. Im just mad and this is the only way that I can actually let it all out lol.

TaLk To YoU lAtEr KiDs...
<3KaErBeAr~

.<.EDIT.>.

My moms never even home in the first place so she has no right to yell at me after being out at a bar all night. :/

Step 1: Get your playlist together, put it on random, and play!
Step 2: Pick your favorite lines from the first 10-20 songs that play!
Step 3: Post and let everyone you know guess what song + band the lines come from!
Step 4: Cross (X) out the songs when someone guesses correctly!

And because i dont know how to do the little l.j cut thing heres the songs


xxx1.No more worries now rest you head and go to sleep 
  Maybe one day we'll wake up and this will all just be a dream.

xxx2.desperate for changing
  starving for truth
  im closer to where i started
  chasing after you

3.so you got all the answer to the questions your heart asks, 
  what you wont say wont hurt you now its all goin all too fast 
  your the one i cant figure out and im the one you cant forget

xxx4.i know a girl she puts the color inside of my world 
  shes just like a maze where all of the walls are continually change 
  and ive done all i can to stand on the steps with my heart in my hand 
  now im starting to see maybe its got nothin to do with me

xxx5.johnnys daddy was takin him fishin he was 8 years old 
  little girl came through the front gate holdin a fishin pole 
  his dad looked down on him and smiled

6.she seemed dressed in all of me 
  stretched across my shame all the torment and the pain
  bleed through and cover me i do anything ever to myself
  just to have it for myself now i dont know what to do

7.i couldnt tell you why she felt that way she felt it everyday 
  and i couldnt help her i just watched her make the same mistakes again 
  whats wrong whats wrong now too many too many problems dont know where she belongs

xxx8.i tried to be perfect but nothing was worth it i dont believe it makes me real 
  i though itd be easy but no one beloieves me i meant all the things 
  i said if you believe its in my soul id say all the words that i know just 
  to see if it would show that im tryin to let you know that im better off on my own

xxx9.open your eyes look up to the skies and see 
  im just a poor boy i need no sympathy because im 
  easy come easy go little high little low anyway the wind blows 
  dosnt really matter to me.. to me

10.well then we got to the place on a high speed chase 
  there was a girly in the corner with a plastic and then 
  she disapeared without a trace i said without a trace

11.if i cut off your arms cut off your legs would you still love me 
  anyways why dont you love me anyway if i cut off your legs cut off your legs would you still love
  me... 

xxx12.they told em dont you ever come around here 
  you dont wanna see your face you better disapear 
  the fires in their eyes their words are very clear so

xxx13.sometimes i wish i was brave 
  i wish i was stronger wish i could feel no pain 
  wish i was young(?) with i would try i wish i was honest i wish i was you not I

xxx14.youve got your ball youve got your chain tied 
  to me tight tight tight me up again whos got the claws in 
  you my friend into your heart heart beat again

xxx15.let me play among the stars let me see what 
  spring is like on jupiter and mars in other words hold my 
  hand in other words baby kiss me fill my heart with song 
  and let me sing for evermore you are all i long for all i worship and adore 

16.long way from home lost by an echo never of known ive got pictures 
  to prove i was there but you dont care heres me over seas cross the pond 
  by the dover peeks ive smuggled myself into new nationalities think youd be proud of me

xxx17.there i go thikin a you again you dont 
  know how sick you make me you make fuckin sick 
  to my stomach everytime i think of you 

yeah thats about good guess!!

Valentines Day huh?  What a crock.
The only was you can enjoy yourself on valentines day is if you have someone to share it with. anyone...

I know I am selfish and I know I am a loner and a bitch and whatever else everyone else says about me. I also know that I am alone, every single valentines day since forever. I always manage to lose the person I had. The person who wanted to be with me just as much as I wanted to be with him.

Now that I want to be with someone... it is tearing me apart that I cant tell him or anyone else because of the outcome that could happen. God I hate valentines day.

as for now were gonna hear
     the sadest songs and sit alone
          and wonder how your making out,
                and as for me i wish that i was
                    anywhere with anyone making out.


      
degrassi is love
brought to you by the isLove Generator
this will probably be one of my last entries... no one reads this anymore anyways so im not gonna write much of anything anymore

Im going to the funeral home today... my neighbor died. Im sorry Whitney I hope to see you soon in school. I guess I will seeyou tonight. R.I.P Glen Felkins 76 years old married for 55 years, his wife didnt expect it... at least thats what she said

Ready to go... later

Hey

Im sick... I dont want to go to school. I have to though, and it sucks...a lot. I dont like band very much anymore. Mr.Braue is a deuche. He thinks hes real sweet when he yells lol. I told him that I hated a song we were playing... in the middle of rehersal and then I was like "yeah I hate this song with a passion" and then he went on and on about how he went to UofM and he would never say that. BLAH FUCKING BLAH. Ugh and I have it 1st hour tomorrow too...

Well tomorrow I have bowling... so that should be good. I like to bowl. As all of my other entries say also lol.

TaLk To YoU lAtEr KiDs...
<3KaErBeAr~

I GOT A JOB AT QUIZNOS!!

Eat Quizno Subs!

Hey!!

I havent been up to a lot lately since i quit the basketball team... I just bowl now lol. We have a tournment on Saturday at Century Bowl at 7am! Ugh this better be a good tournment or im gonna be pissed. Megan was is a bad mood today lol. Cat and Katy always like... act different when people are there watching... like guys to be honest. The always like try and show off and what not. They left like 40 minutes before bractice ended too so that made us all mad. Katy's the captain and she shouldnt leave whenever she doesnt feel like bowling anymore. It's so dumb. 

HAHA I got an outfit yesterday from AE for shure! I wore it today lol. I got a white long sleeve shirt and I got a Red vest and then I got some black pants! It was so cool lol I was so excited to wear it. Of course I had no awesome shoes to wear with it lol. 

So I went to my new classes today! I have Math 1 now and I like it. I sat by Jake Seymore today. He's a pretty cool kid. Nick Scott sat behind me though :/ Chelsea is in my class too... I dont talk to her though so its okay. I have strength fitness for 6th hour. Ismel is in my class again!! Ugh but so is Lucas... I sit RIGHT next to him. Ugh this is gonna be one fun semester..let me tell you lol. 

Okay well I dont have much more to talk about so I am just gonna leave it at that

TaLk To YoU lAtEr KiDs...

<3 KaErBeAr~

1 - Pick a band or singer and use only that band/singer's lyrics to answer the questions : blink 182

2 - Are you male or female? *shes* getting kicked out of school cuz *shes* failing

3 - Describe yourself : too blind to see tomorrow, to broke to beg or borrow, young and stupid

4 - How do you feel about yourself? :im too depressed to go on youll be sorry when im gone...

5 - Where would you rather be? : I want to leave in the worst possible way so I could come home to see you But Things don't look to good on that subject This war has spoiled a lot of things for everyone I guess I've never been so lonesome in my life as I am right now I'm completely lost without you darling

6 - Describe where you live : I know what it's like to be alone sitting in your room Listening to all the doubts that your parents have to say to you

7 - Say something to someone you love : is it cool if i hold your hand, is it wrong if i think its lame to dance do you like my stupid hair could you guess that i didnt know what to wear im just scared of what you think, you make me nervous so i really cant eat

8 - Say something to an ex : and i hate hate hate your guts i hate hate hate your guts and ill never talk to you again... 

9 - Say something to someone that broke your heart:i cant forgive cant forget cant give in what went wrong cuz you said this was right you fucked up my life...
I quit the basketball team. Im sorry :/

Hey!!

Yeah this week is gonna blow...majorly. I have to pass 2 out of 6 mid terms... or else i may not get credit for freshman year. A little upset about that. I have a band "playing test" tomorrow and I havent played anything for it and I also have math tomorrow... I have math. I think I am one of the dumbest freshman ever. I hate school :/

So on Saturday we did really good at our bowling tournment... I bowled a 172,165, and a 157. Everyone else bowled AWESOME!! It was so much fun. Then on Sunday we murdered Kettering for shure!! HaHa lol I got one point for my matches i bowled a 185 and a 162 (lost the 162 game). It was also a lot of fun. Then today at practice I bowling like a 106 lol it was really funny. I got the 5 7 split though it was so awesome.

Tomorrow I have to go to work for my brother from 3-5... then Ryan Bollman is coming to get me and he is going to take me to the Kettering game. I will be at the JV and possibly thr Varsity. I am going to see Brad Dorr lol. For shure. I miss all the people that go to Kettering. Man it would be so much better for me at Mott if a selected few went there. Oh well. 

I have to go take a shower and what not. I just got home from gay ass basketball. I hate our coach hes a deuche. Oh well

TaLk To YoU lAtEr KiDs...

<3 KaErBeAr~

I went bowling tonight...and I had a lot of fun. I have a bowling match in like 8 hours... i have to sleep. Good night!

<3 KaErBeAr~

"now i remembered why i stopped talking to you" again with the #1 conversation ender...

Go ahead leave an anonoymous comment... go ahead cuss me out.. and go ahead walk right on out of my lonely pathetic selfish life Ryan Trevino. Just like you did last year. Im sorry im not good enough for you. Im sorry I dont set high enough standards for myself. And im sorry that I cant bring myself to apologize AGAIN just for one person. If you dont like who I am now... then you dont have to. I know you dont anyways. Im glad weve always gotten along so well. Im also glad that when you and me get in a tiny fight... you ALWAYS no matter what, ignore me. ALWAYS! Im happy that you have such good friend who talk behind your back and call you gay. And you only blame one person. Like me hah what a crock. Someone sayd something and I agreed like a few selected others on your little list. Its no wonder were mad at you. You dont pay attention to emotion. You say what you want and then leave. AHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH OH MY FUCKING GOD I FUCKING HATE WHEN YOU JUST GO ON A FUCKING AWAY MESSAGE ALL THE FUCKING GOD DAMN TIME ALWAYS I WISH I COULD JUST YELL AT SOMEONE OR SOMETHING THAT WOULD JUST LISTEN TO ME. GODDDDDDD I FUCKING HATE HOW YOU THINK THAT YOU ARE THE ONLY PERSON WHO HAS SOMETHING TO SAY. I FUCKING HATE HOW YOU THINK YOU ARE THE ONLY PERSON WHO HAS TO GO DO SOMETHING ELSE. I FUCKING HATE TALKING TO SOMEONE WHO IS MORE USELESS THAT A BIG PILE OF HORSE SHIT ON A FUCKING FARM. I HATE TALK TO SOMEONE WHO DOESNT THINK THAT BEING FRIENDS WITH SOMEONE YOUVE KNOWN FOR OVER A YEAR IS LESS IMPORTANT... THAN SOMETHING YOU WONT EVEN FUCKING TELL ME. 

School sucks. Mid-Term cramming blows. Being in the "fast moving" math class was a waste of my very little ability. So basicly I got placed in some good classes for average people so I could get a fuckin D- through the whole semester... to not pass freshman math class... to lose credit... and look forward to some wonderul fucking summer school. I hate school. I have stress. I really really needed to vent. Thank you. Oh and thank you to Jeff Kitchen and Justin Fralick who rode home with me today and listened to me complain. I appreciate it. Thank you Jessika for always talking to me when I go insane, and knowing how I feel all the time in every mood swing i have. Thank you Kelsey Meyer for walking and talking with me about something I actually want to waste my life on. Thank you to everyone who puts up with my shit all the time.

Kristy

P.S Happy Birthday Marilyn Manson.

I have to admit... today was one of the worst days of the year... ugh im sorry I complain so much

Happy New Year

Leave a comment of how ive changed
It can be in any way
Be brudally honest, dont let up
Or thats all for this kid
Im growing up...
Cooper!! That was the most awesome game ever. I felt honored to be on your team for that 35 minute game! <3

Hey!!

So today... I had to wake up at like 7:15 so I could get ready for bball at 8. Who schedule practice at 8am on our break? Obviously our gay coach. I hate him. We got to meet our assistant coach today though. He is so cool lol. He laughs all the time. Unlike Gruca.

I am going bowling at 5 with Ryan Bollman though lol that should be kinda fun I guess. Yeah it will lol.

Yeah so today was quite boring and tomorrow will probably be te same way. I dont have much to write so that was it...

TaLk To YoU lAtEr KiDs...

<3 KaErBeAr~
